author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: ...قل يا معشر العلمآء لا تزنوا كتاب الله بما عندكم من القواعد والعلوم إنّه لقسطاس الحقّ بين الخلق قد يوزن ما عند الأمم بهذا القسطاس الأعظم وإنّه بنفسه لو أنتم تعلمون
translation: Say: O leaders of religion! Weigh not the Book of God with such standards and sciences as are current amongst you, for the Book itself is the unerring balance established amongst men. In this most perfect balance whatsoever the peoples and kindreds of the earth possess must be weighed, while the measure of its weight should be tested according to its own standard, did ye but know it.
